description:
"WHEN ONLY THE BEST WILL DO"
Set in the ever popular Brimbank Gardens is this superb family home offering every possible luxury you could ask for. Comprises of 3 generous bedrooms with master suite offering a large ensuite and walk in robe. Entry leads to a spacious formal lounge area, and you will find a large immaculate kitchen with granite bench tops and quality appliances overlooking an open meals area and adjoining family room. Adding to this home is a third living area to the top of the stairs also quality fittings and fixtures throughout, including a front brick fence with power close by to add security gates, double garage with internal access, plus ducted heating and Evaporative cooling. This home must be inspected to be fully appreciated. Great workmanship and design has gone into the creation of this home.
Cameron Marrs : 0400 515 458

Elegant Location
This is a beautiful part of Derrimut with a sensitive blending of the environment and the residential community.
Being positioned with easy access to the CBD via the Deer Park bypass and only moments from the local upcoming shopping centre, schools and public transport.
On offer is approx 512m2 of land.
Directly opposite parkland, giving plenty of room for the kids to play.
What an opportunity, don't delay building your home any longer.
Call today for more details.
Christiana Christoforou : 0402795728

Needle In The Hay Stack
If you are looking for a central location block to build your new home, then this corner 630m2 (approx) building site is just for you. Short distance to schools, child care centres and bus service should you choose to ride. Now is the time to purchase in the beautiful Brimbank Gardens estate and start building the home your family's waiting for. Call now for more details. Land selling fast, act today.
Cameron Marrs : 0400 515 458

How Quaint & Cosy Is This?
Beautifully presented and ideally situated stands this young family home that will cater to all your needs. With its quaint open plan living zone and its modern features you will always look forward to arriving home.
Comprising:-
3 bedrooms, BIR's, master with full en-suite & WIR, open plan living, consisting of well equipped modern kitchen, family and dining areas, central bathroom & double remote drive- thru garage
Features :- Ducted heating, S/S appliances, tiled floors,blank canvass gardens.
Bonuses:-
Great
access to Western Highway, Ring Roads & is close to the parks, new schools, new shopping plaza and the newly developed golf course.
Robert Christakakis : 0407 517 761

BUILD YOUR IDEAL HOME
Here's your opportunity to buy in the great Brimbank Gardens. Positioned within walking distance to Parklands, proposed schools and shopping centres this beautifully located parcel of land measuring approximately 576m2 awaits. It is also 17km from the city; turn this great area into your neighborhood.

Simply Move In and Enjoy
You'll be delighted with the quilt, space and style this brand new home has to offer. Located in the ever popular Estate of Brimbank Gardens this lovely 4 bedroom home captures the heart of first home buyers or Investors alike. Comprising with all bedrooms with built in robes, master with full ensuite and WIR, open plan living/meals area and kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Extras include double drive through garage, ducted heating, alarm system, low maintenance gardens and more. Inspect today.
Nam Nguyen : 0450 061 169

Location Perfect For Your Family
Put your finishing touch to this 3 bedroom family oasis in a perfectly quiet location only minutes from schools and soon to be Derrimut shopping centre. Comprising: Light filled formal living room, large kitchen overlooking the meals area and family living space. Stepping outside to the rear of the property offers generous sized backyard and raised timber decked entertainment area. Extras include; ducted heating, 900mm stainless steel cook top and under bench oven and dishwasher. Opportunity sure not to last long, so act quick call today.
Cameron Marrs : 0400 515 458

Family Haven
This simply stunning home offers a luxurious lifestyle for the whole family. Spacious in design and offering both formal and informal living areas, fully equipped kitchen/family room, three bedrooms plus study plus gas ducted heating and split system cooling. This home is enhanced by an outdoor entertaining area, double lock-up garage with internal access and lovely landscaped gardens complement this home. Located amongst other quality properties and over looking Derrimut's grasslands so you can enjoy the fantastic sunsets. This one not to last, call now to make arrangements to inspect.
Cameron Marrs : 0400 515 458

Desirable & Affordable
Centrally located in the Brimbank Gardens Estate, with-in strolling distance to parklands, schools and public transport. This 3 bedroom home will provide the perfect solution to your family needs. Offering Formal living and dining area, family room, well appointed kitchen, all bedrooms with built in robes, and low maintenance gardens. Features include double remote garage, ducted heating, alarm system and set on a good sized allotment. Be quick for this affordable opportunity.
Branko Kuburovski : 0417 306 001

Great Investment Opportunity in a fast growing area or ideal first home.
Comprising 3 large bedrooms with BIR'S
Master includes ensuite & WIR
Spacious open plan kitchen /meals and family room
Features include: ducted heating & s/s appliances
Double remote garage with internal access
Metres to parkland's and set on a low maintenance allotment

Stylish Home, Great Location
Be amazed as soon as you step inside this great family home. The lovely residence comprises of three great sized bedrooms plus study or 4th bedroom, formal and informal living zones and rumpus room at the rear of the property and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Extras include, ducted heating, cooling, double garage, covered outdoor entertainment area and all in a fantastic location close to public transport, parklands and freeway access. Inspection sure to impress.
Cameron Marrs : 0400 515 458

Create Your Garden Here
This is an absolutely outstanding opportunity to secure a marvellous home, in a great position with a unique large front yard.
Moments from major arterials, public reserves and Golf Course, this property will allow you to live the lifestyle you've always wanted.
Offering 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 with WIRs, master with ensuite, formal lounge, open living consisting of modern kitchen, meals & family area, central bathroom with spa, ducted heating, double garage & sunroom, all this on over 800sqms of land.
Robert Christakakis : 0407 517 761

Ticks All The Right Boxes
Take pride in owning this magnificent contemporary well designed home, perfectly set across the park, proposed school and shopping centre. With great access to Ballarat Road, Western Highway, Deer Park Village Shops & close to the newly developed golf course will become your prized possession.
Comprising: 3 generous sized bedrooms including the main with double toilets, en-suite and walk in robe, open plan living, generous kitchen, dining & family areas, formal lounge, rumpus room & theatre room, charming alfresco area & double remote garage on land of approx 505sqms .
Features: High ceiling, central heating, dishwasher & stainless steel appliances.
Frank Abdallah : 0425 778 166

Rare 18m Frontage
The opportunity is here to secure a residential allotment in this highly sought after location, with the bonus of an 18m wide frontage. Surrounded by all amenities and parklands.
Build your dream home with room for the kids to enjoy, set amongst other quality homes.
Land Size 18m x 31.5m (571sqm)
Frank Barbakos : 0419 611 755

Affordable, Delightful and Functional
Value packed and well designed with low maintenance and comfort in mind, enjoy living in this very stylish family home. The contemporary layout offers informal and causal living areas, well equipped kitchen/tiled dining area, open family room, 4 large bedrooms plus study, lock up garage, heating and cooling, all set on a good size allotment. Make it yours today.
Nam Nguyen : 0450 061 169

Bigger is Better
Feeling cramped? This is the house for you, with enormous living areas plus 4 large bedrooms, 2 with en-suites. In fact all the rooms are large, the open plan kitchen has a long serving and preparation area plus walk thru pantry. The laundry is big and so are the bathrooms. This house also includes well-appointed living, dining and rumpus rooms all fitted with stylish plantation shutters. Don't let this opportunity slip.
Richard Carthew : 0422 375 493

Your Dream Can Begin Here
The opportunity is here to secure one of the last residential allotments in this highly sought after location, with the advantages of being surrounded by all conceivable amenities including schools, shopping centre and parks.
Build your dream home with room for the kids to enjoy, set amongst other quality homes.
Land Size 17.55m x 32.3m (567sqm)
Martin Artigas : 0407 808 932

Complete Luxury, Desirable Lifestyle
Superbly finished inside and out is this luxury 4 bedroom home cleverly designed with todays contemporary lifestyle in mind.
With its alfresco dining area, you have the luxury of indoor/ outdoor living on substantial land boasting broad frontage on a generous 640 sqm allotment (approx.) near parkland. Well presented for comfortable current-day living, this home close to golf course, parks, shopping & transport.
Comprising: 4 generous bedrooms with en-suite (WIR & BIRs), open plan living, kitchen with dining & living area, rumpus, alfresco & double remote garage
Features: Ducted heating & split system heating, stainless steel appliances, d/washer, down-lights, polished floor boards, 2200 litre water tank & landscaped front.
Tom Kyriakou : 0418 322 448

Land measuring 17.95m x 35m = 629sqm (approx)
Suitable for single or double storey dwellings (STCA)

To avoid missing out register your interest now

3 generous sized bedrooms wirh BIR's
